moves.description: Fix transport object creation in getCombinedMCPToolsForAISDK
moves.details: Replicate the transport object creation logic from initializeMCPManager to handle legacy config format where servers only have 'url' field instead of full 'transport' object

moves.description: Remove debug logging and clean up code
moves.details: Remove the temporary debug logging added to troubleshoot the issue and clean up any unnecessary code

moves.description: Test SSE tool loading and verify tool count
moves.details: Build and test to verify that SSE tool count goes from 0 to 107 and all SSE servers show their tools as loaded
Verify that the AI can actually invoke SSE tools (e.g., try using an mcp-unraid tool) and that they work without errors
